name: Filipe Felício
bio: Started programming five years ago. Used to spend all day writing code in CeSIUM, still do from time to time. Elixir enthusiast, working @ Marmelasoft. Proud owner of a |> tattoo.

name: David Machado
bio: Full-stack developer, started his coding journey at sixteen. As a vocational highschool graduation project he built a CSS framework. Currently studying Computer Science @ University of Minho.

name: Rui Lopes
bio: Started programming four years ago and since there never stopped. Loves Python and its starting to love Elixir too. Joined CeSIUM to develop a lot more skills and meet new people. Aiming to install Arch Linux for the 15th time last week.

name: José Nuno Oliveira
bio: Software technology is pre-scientific in its lack of an effective basis for predicting computers' behaviour. My research aims at improving scientific standards in software design through formal methods and calculational techniques. These include the application of mathematical transforms in refactoring and improving existing software theories. I do this with passion and firmly believe this will make computing better in the future.

name: Nelson Estevão
role: Ex-President @ CeSIUM & Teacher @ University of Minho

name: Catarina Machado
role: Ex-President @ CeSIUM & Teacher @ University of Minho
